donuts.title: Chocolate Hazelnut Donut
donuts.description: Indulge in the rich flavors of our chocolate glazed donut with a luscious hazelnut praline filling.
donuts.additionalInfo: Handcrafted with the finest Belgian chocolate and freshly ground hazelnuts.

donuts.title: Raspberry Filled Donut
donuts.description: Experience the delightful combination of fluffy donut filled with sweet and tangy raspberry jam.

donuts.title: Vanilla Bean Donut
donuts.description: Savor the classic vanilla bean donut topped with a silky vanilla bean glaze.

donuts.title: Cinnamon Sugar Donut
donuts.description: Enjoy the warm and comforting flavors of our cinnamon sugar donut.

donuts.title: Glazed Donut
donuts.description: Treat yourself to our signature glazed donut.
donuts.additionalInfo: Handcrafted with the finest Belgian chocolate.

donuts.title: Strawberry Donut
donuts.description: Savor the sweet and fruity flavors of our strawberry donut topped with strawberry glaze.

cupcakes.title: Red Velvet Cupcake
cupcakes.description: Indulge in the classic red velvet cupcake topped with creamy cream cheese frosting.
cupcakes.additionalInfo: Moist and irresistible, a customer favorite.

cupcakes.title: Cookies and Cream Cupcake
cupcakes.description: Delight your taste buds with a rich chocolate cupcake topped with cookies and cream frosting.
cupcakes.additionalInfo: Adorned with a mini Oreo cookie.

cupcakes.title: Strawberry Cupcake
cupcakes.description: Savor the sweet and fruity flavors of our strawberry cupcake topped with strawberry buttercream frosting.

cupcakes.title: Chocolate Cupcake
cupcakes.description: Enjoy the rich and decadent flavors of our chocolate cupcake topped with chocolate buttercream frosting.
cupcakes.additionalInfo: Handcrafted with the finest Belgian chocolate.

cupcakes.title: Vanilla Cupcake
cupcakes.description: Savor the classic vanilla cupcake topped with vanilla buttercream frosting.

cupcakes.title: Lemon Cupcake
cupcakes.description: Treat yourself to our lemon cupcake topped with lemon buttercream frosting.
cupcakes.additionalInfo: Made with fresh lemon juice and zest.

cupcakes.title: Peanut Butter Cupcake
cupcakes.description: Indulge in the rich flavors of our peanut butter cupcake topped with peanut butter frosting.

beverages.title: Iced Caramel Macchiato
beverages.description: Refresh yourself with our signature iced caramel macchiato made with premium espresso, velvety milk, and a drizzle of caramel.
beverages.additionalInfo: Customizable sweetness and additional espresso shots or flavored syrups.

beverages.title: Matcha Green Tea Latte
beverages.description: Savor the earthy and vibrant flavors of our creamy matcha green tea latte.

beverages.title: Cappuccino
beverages.description: Enjoy the rich and bold flavors of our cappuccino.

beverages.title: Hot Chocolate
beverages.description: Warm yourself with our signature hot chocolate.
beverages.additionalInfo: Handcrafted with the finest Belgian chocolate.

beverages.title: Caramel Latte
beverages.description: Indulge in the rich flavors of our caramel latte.
beverages.additionalInfo: Customizable sweetness and additional espresso shots or flavored syrups.

sandwiches.title: Chicken Avocado Sandwich
sandwiches.description: Savor the combination of tender grilled chicken, creamy avocado, crisp lettuce, and zesty aioli in our mouthwatering sandwich.

sandwiches.title: Caprese Panini
sandwiches.description: Enjoy the Italian flavors of our grilled panini with fresh mozzarella, ripe tomatoes, basil, and balsamic glaze.

sandwiches.title: Turkey Club Sandwich
sandwiches.description: Indulge in the classic turkey club sandwich with roasted turkey, crisp bacon, lettuce, tomato, and mayonnaise.

sandwiches.title: Ham and Cheese Panini
sandwiches.description: Savor the classic ham and cheese panini with smoked ham, cheddar cheese, and honey mustard.

sandwiches.title: Roast Beef Sandwich
sandwiches.description: Enjoy the rich flavors of our roast beef sandwich with tender roast beef, caramelized onions, and horseradish aioli.
